scripts.text:
IF OBJECT_ID('Sakthivel.dataflow') IS NOT NULL
DROP TABLE Sakthivel.dataflow;
CREATE TABLE Sakthivel.dataflow(ProductID INTEGER,Name VARCHAR(MAX),ProductNumber VARCHAR(MAX),Color VARCHAR(MAX),StandardCost DECIMAL(10,4),ListPrice DECIMAL(10,4),  
Size INTEGER,Weight DECIMAL(10,2),
ProductCategoryID INTEGER,ProductModelID INTEGER,SellStartDate INTEGER, 
SellEndDate VARCHAR(MAX),DiscontinuedDate VARCHAR(MAX),ThumbNailPhoto VARBINARY(6000),   
ThumbnailPhotoFileName VARCHAR(MAX),
rowguid VARCHAR(MAX),
ModifiedDate VARCHAR(MAX),
ParentProductCategoryID INTEGER,
RankNumber INTEGER)
